doc.field: INFINITE GRAPHICS INFG.O> IN JOINT VEENTURE

Infinite Graphics Inc said it signed a letter of intent to create a joint venture with Computer Design Equipment Co> to expand sales of its computer-aided design equipment in the Midwest. Infinite Graphics said it will manage and hold the controlling interest in the venture, National CADD-Pro Upper Midwest. Computer Design has headquarters in Syracuse, Ind. Reuter
